title: Ticket #5846: Print CondorError stacks more prettily.
description:
The current implementation of CondorError::getFullText() is rather ugly, especially if it's not actually appearing as part of a single line in a log. The user will now see this output as a result of implementing #5532.

TJ agreed, saying that this was OK for now, but also that "I have to fix it for the submit interface at some point anyway."
creator: tlmiller
